content: गौतमी {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kṛpī, wife of Droṇa. {@--2@} An epithet of the Godāvarī. {@--3@} The teaching of Buddha. {@--4@} The Nyāya system of philosophy propounded by Gautama. {@--5@} Turmeric. {@--6@} A kind of yellow pigment. {@--7@} An epithet of Durgā. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Gomatī.
